message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1,200,000.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. While I agree the product is high-quality, that price is a little high for me.  I'd be willing to purchase it for $800,000.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $800,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1,000,000.
